
You will need the GitHub CLI installed
(this is pre-installed on all github actions runners):
<https://github.com/cli/cli#installation>

Then install the `ccbr_actions` package with pip:

```bash
pip install git+https://github.com/CCBR/actions
```

Or install it from a specific version or branch with:

```{python}
#| echo: false
#| output: asis

from ccbr_actions.util import repo_base
from ccbr_tools.pkg_util import get_version
from ccbr_tools.versions import get_major_minor_version
version = get_major_minor_version(get_version(repo_base))
print("\n".join([
    "```bash",
    f"pip install git+https://github.com/CCBR/actions@v{version}",
    "```"
]))
```
